content:
This chunk is part of a comprehensive configuration file that defines various parameters and settings for a software application, likely related to graphics rendering, window management, and user interface behavior. The specific chunk focuses on stereo display configurations (side-by-side stereo), scene graph analysis tools, screenshot capture options, and scrolling behavior delays, all within the broader context of application preferences and runtime settings.

eye, when side-by-side stereo is enabled. This is a set of four numbers,
in the form left right top bottom, similar to a normal DisplayRegion
layout. sbs-right-dimensions double 0.5 1.0 0.0 1.0 Defines the default region of the window that is used for the right
eye, when side-by-side stereo is enabled. This is a set of four numbers,
in the form left right top bottom, similar to a normal DisplayRegion
layout. scene-graph-analyzer-meter-layer-sort int 1000 scene-graph-analyzer-meter-scale double 0.05 scene-graph-analyzer-meter-side-margins double 0.5 scene-graph-analyzer-meter-update-interval double 2.0 screenshot-extension string jpg DConfig screenshot-filename string %~p-%a-%b-%d-%H-%M-%S-%Y-%~f.%~e This specifies the filename pattern to be used to generate
screenshots captured via save_screenshot_default(). See
DisplayRegion::save_screenshot(). scroll-continued-delay double 0.1 This is the amount of time, in seconds, to delay between lines
